title: Thunderlord's Decree still does not work when multiple teammates use it
body:
As the title says, the hotfix that was suppose to fix it did not fix it for real.

Was just in a game as Sona support with Thunderlord's decree, when my Mid TF and jungle Quinn had it too and mine did not proc at all in the entire game.

You guys may need to look into the code more further so you can fix it for real, its really lame that your keystone mastery bugs out because you guys added too much power into them.

replies.body: At least a notification in client would be nice if this is the case. "Hey guys, this mastery is bugged! Refrain from picking it in order to not put yourself at a massive disadvantage against opponents who have working keystones."

Thanks for the report, I wasn't able to reproduce this using tf/quinn/sona with thunderlord's. Do you have more information that could help me get a reproduction? Maybe a match history link so that I can check into more detail.

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/113508035/208009601?tab=overview

Here you go, hope it helps.
Could you take a look also at Lucian's ult not dealing 400% damage to minions?

Yeah, taking a useless keystone last patch was pretty disappointing.  Haven't played the new patch yet though.

S6 preseason is a little to beta for my tastes.  Prob won't play a lot again for a while until the game quality improves significantly.
I'm sorry, go ahead show me how the code should be. Fix it for them!

This is not true...
I have been Azir mid with a Rammus top and we both had Thunderlords Decree. It worked for both of us...
Really I've had a few games where it works properly now.
